text: Jhalmar "Sebastian" Joffre Soliz (born 21 August 1999) is a Bolivian professional footballer who is currently a free agent. He last played for Orlando City B in USL League One. He was waived by Orlando City B on 13 May 2019 after making 3 appearances for the team. == Early life == Joffre was born in Portachuelo, Bolivia and moved to Naples, Florida in 2012 when he was 13. He attended Gulf Coast High School and led them to the FHSAA State Championship after beating Duncan U. Fletcher High 2–1 in extra time and also scoring the winning goal. == References == == External links == * Sebastian Joffre at EFSC Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Bolivian emigrants to the United States Category:Soccer players from Florida Category:Bolivian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:EFSC Titans men's soccer players Category:SW Florida Adrenaline players Category:Orlando City B players Category:USL League One players Category:USL League Two players Category:Bolivian expatriate footballers Category:Bolivian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States
title: Sebastian Joffre
